name: Bow & Arrow Fruit Shoot
description:
Bow & Arrow Fruit Shoot is the ultimate archery shooter 3d game and shooting fruit game, or one of the best bow and arrow games, to do so.Game is an addictive archery shooting game, where you get to shoot watermelons placed at different positions, with a bow and arrow, keeping the time in mind.Have fun shooting the watermelons at all the levels, by playing one of the best archery games 3d and fruit games free, or best archery games in the world and shoot the fruit archery games.
Features
Amazing 3d graphics and engaging gameplay.
40 levels to perform archery shooting.
Realistic watermelon breaking sound.
Addictive time management game.
